title: Jio to global giants scramble for big wealth pile-up of India's rich
description: India's wealth management sector is booming with local and global companies competing for a share. UBS Group AG is exploring partnerships, while Sanlam Ltd. and Jio Financial Services are entering the market. The sector's growth is driven by rising high-net-worth individuals, asset appreciation, and income growth, despite a talent shortage.
